sources.title: Fixed (ROMANTIC COMEDY full film German, new comedies films)
Fixed | Full Movie | Crime Thriller | Nisaro Karim | Bareknuckle Fight
sources.description:
Fixed - A petty gambler is leaving to start a new life with his girlfriend in Spain when he’s caught fixing a bareknuckle fight. Confined with only a cell phone and his wits, he must hatch an escape plan or meet his fate from an angry crime boss.
2021.  Stars: Nicholas Clarke, Nisaro Karim, Dean Kilbey

metadata.Plot: Allan is a married father of three whose sex life takes another hit when his wife can no longer take the pill. He soon finds himself with an appointment for a vasectomy and a nagging identity crisis. Although he is by all reasonable accounts a good, responsible man, the thought of getting "fixed" drives him to lose himself to an action-packed midlife crisis along with his best friends. Allan will refuse to grow up anymore.
metadata.Actors: Andy Comeau, Courtney Henggeler, Mindy Sterling
